title: Your Teen Son's Self-Esteem
itunes:author: Guest: Jonathan McKee
itunes:summary:
A healthy confidence is one of the best things you teen son can develop. But how can you help him get it? John and Danny share how teaching your son to serve others can help him embrace confidence. Featuring Jonathan McKee.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/parentingpodcast, or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

Receive Jonathan's book "The Guy's Guide to Four Battles Every Young Man Must Face" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofp-podcast-2022-02-22?refcd=1332303

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-parenting-podcast/your-teen-sons-self-esteem/#featured-resource-cta

Listen Anytime: https://store.focusonthefamily.com/championing-your-son-through-his-battles-digital-product?refcd=1332303

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
